text: Bjørn Hjalmar Sand (born 19 September 1928) is a Norwegian revue writer and actor. He was born in Oslo, and is half brother of Rolf Sand. He married Unni Bernhoft in 1955, is son-in-law of Bias Bernhoft and is the father of Jon Ola Sand. He is particularly known for his character "Stutum" on Norwegian radio, a role which earned him the award Spellemannprisen 1973. He was awarded the Leonard Statuette in 1994. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Male actors from Oslo Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian male stage actors Category:Leonard Statuette winners Category:Spellemannprisen winners Category:Norwegian male radio actors
title: Bjørn Sand
